mapper.insert: Insert into CORP.NVONTRNRCV ( PICKUP_VENDOR, REPORT_STATUS, UNIT, PKU_NOTICE_DATE, PRODUCTION_DATE, HOLD_DATE, ADV_NOTICE_CANCEL_DATE, OEM, PLANT_CODE, ORIGIN_NAME, ORIGIN_ADD_1, ORIGIN_ADD_2, ORIGIN_CITY, ORGIN_STATE_PROV, ORIGIN_ZIP_CODE, ORIGIN_PHONE, DEST_CODE, DEST_NAME, DEST_ADD_1, DEST_ADD_2, DEST_CITY, DEST_STATE_PROV, DEST_ZIP_CODE, DEST_PHONE, EST_MILES, VIN, BODY_SERIAL, UNIT_GVW, PO_CATEGORY, VEHICLE_CATEGORY, VEHICLE_TYPE, FUEL_TYPE, SLPR_CODE, AERO_ROOF, AERO_SIDE, AERO_CAB, DECKING, NO_DECKS, FREIGHT_AMOUNT, FUEL_SUR_CHARGE, ADD_ON_CHARGES, TOTAL_AMOUNT, TRNST_PO, TRNST_PO_DATE, UNIT_DELIVERY_DATE, ACT_DELV_REPORTED, FLUID_AMOUNT, BREAKDWN_AMOUNT, TOLL_AMOUNT, MISC_AMOUNT, REVISED_AMOUNT, SUBMIT_PAYMENT, PENSKE_COMMENT, TRANSPORTER_COMMENT, ASSIGN_DATE, LAST_CHANGE_DATE, CORP, PARENT_VENDOR, PO_NO, ADV_NOTICE_SEQ, REPORT_ID, LIFTGATE_MAKE, LIFTGATE_MODEL, TREDEL ) values ( #{pickupVendor}, #{status}, #{unitNo}, #{requestedPickupDate}, #{productionDate}, #{holdNotificationDate}, #{advanceNoticeCancelDate}, #{oem}, #{plantCode}, #{plantName}, #{plantAdrs1}, #{plantAdrs1}, #{originCity}, #{originState}, #{originZipCode}, #{originContactInfo}, #{destCode}, #{dlvName}, #{dlvAdrs1}, #{dlvAdrs2}, #{destCity}, #{destState}, #{destZipCode}, #{destContactInfo}, #{mileage}, #{vin}, #{bodySerial}, #{unitGvw}, #{cat}, #{vehicleCategory}, #{vehicleType}, #{fuelType}, #{slprCode}, #{aeroRoof}, #{aeroSide}, #{aeroCab}, #{decking}, #{numDecks}, #{frieghtAmount}, #{fuelSurcharge}, #{penskeAddOnCharge}, #{totalAmount}, #{trnstPo}, #{transitPoDate}, #{actDelvry}, #{actualDeliveryReported}, #{fluids}, #{breakDown}, #{tolls}, #{misc}, #{revisedPOAmount}, #{isPOAmountAccepted}, #{penskeComment}, #{transporterComment}, #{transporterAssignDate}, #{lastChangedDate}, #{companyCode}, #{parentVendor}, #{purchasePoNum}, #{advancedNoticeSequence}, #{reportId}, #{liftgateMake}, #{liftgateModel}, #{estimatedDeliveryDate} )
